document.full_text: during mr. reinhardt's tenure at the network, he oversaw the opening of overseas news bureaus and the creation of shows like 'crossfire' and 'larry king live.'
document.title: burt reinhardt, ex-cnn president, is dead at 91
lines_and_colors: during mr. reinhardt's tenure at the network, he oversaw the opening of overseas news bureaus and the creation of shows like 'crossfire' and 'larry king live.'
